backend/main.mo: Defines core resident-related types and comparison utilities with authorization and storage mixins included in the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment checklist for Version 89 covering build steps, retry script usage, and smoke-test prerequisites.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling including color variables, dark mode values, and base theme rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Retry script that rebuilds the frontend, deploys to the IC network, logs all output, and saves canister IDs.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed Version 89 smoke‑test procedures verifying login, authentication, dashboard loading, and error‑free behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, startup health checks, and routing.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for adding ADL records for a resident, including date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog form to record a resident's daily vital signs with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for adding a medication administration record tied to a resident’s active medications.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog form for adding a new medication to a resident, including dosage, route, times, and physician info.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Form dialog for creating a resident record, supporting multiple physicians, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a weight measurement to a resident, validating inputs and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the application logo with size and mode options, falling back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Shows build info and backend canister ID with tooltip details for diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Form dialog for editing a resident’s medication, preloading existing values and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large dialog for editing full resident details, populating fields from the selected resident and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup form allowing a user to save their name and employee ID.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: React component that displays a startup error screen with error details, backend diagnostics, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and other backend data, including startup‑safe versions.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Hook that creates a backend actor with timeouts and best‑effort admin initialization, providing safer startup behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode, dialog overrides, and extensive print‑specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Promise timeout wrapper plus helpers for detecting, normalizing, and classifying backend canister errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-safe asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL and normalizes slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Generates frontend build/version info and a compact build identifier based on env vars and commit hash.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts between date strings and nanoseconds and formats or computes ages without timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Extracts backend diagnostics from environment and performs a timeout-protected health check.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized timeouts for startup, health checks, and actor/profile operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Resident dashboard that fetches, sorts, filters, and manages residents with admin actions and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with a styled card and background image.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: React page that loads a resident by ID, displays detailed profile info, and manages dialogs for editing, MAR/ADL records, medications, vitals, and printing states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, shadows, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing fix requirements, known issues, and existing feature definitions for resolving missing admin actions in production.
